AVEVA Group PLC
02 June 2021
 

AVEVA Group plc

 

Director/PDMR Shareholding

 

 

AVEVA Group plc announces that on 1 June 2021 it was notified of the following share purchase and share option exercise and sale of shares which took place:

 

Peter Herweck, CEO

 

On 1 June 2021, Mr Herweck purchased 13,500 ordinary shares with a nominal value of 35/9 pence per share, at a price of £35.48 per share.

 

Claire Denton, Group General Counsel and Company Secretary

 

On 28 May 2021, Ms Denton exercised options over 779 shares following the 2018 award under the AVEVA Group Deferred Share Bonus Plan, selling 368 of the resulting shares at a price of £34.59 per share to settle associated tax and national insurance liabilities, retaining the balance of 411 shares.
